title: STAT+: Mass General Brigham bolstered its bottom line. Other Mass. hospital groups reported multimillion losses
description: Despite uncertainty and concern buffeting Massachusetts hospitals, the state’s largest health system saw its finances improve last year.
content: Despite uncertainty and concern buffeting Massachusetts hospitals, the state’s largest health system saw its finances improve last year.
